name: Gun Swap
description:
A game submission for the brackey's gamejam :D 

I used this gamejam to learn about gamemaker studio 2, i was a bit limited because it was all new to me! But i ended up making good progress and not only that i made the  pixel art of the game , witch may not that good, but I think im getting better comparing to other past drawings. Sadly i couldn't use all the time that i had available, i didn't develop the mechanics that good and neither had time to make music for it, but I could finish the game and deliver a decent experience at least :D I hope you have fun playing it!
